name: Bannerspace Slideshow
author: Dean Oakley

sections.description:
Bannerspace is powered by the awesome jQuery Cycle plugin. The plugin creates a custom post type for your slides and allows the user to create simple slideshows with funky transition effects such as fade, scroll, shuffle, zoom, and more.
At the moment it is only capable of creating a single slide show per page.

The Bannerspace plugin allows you to:

  • Select the transition effect
  • Easily set the size of the banner, image and content areas
  • Order slides via drag and drop using the Simple Page Ordering
  • Change the colour of the UI elements
  • and more…

See a demo here
sections.installation:
1. Upload /bannerspace/ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the new custom posts menu item ‘Banner Slides’ to create the slides
  4. Place the shortcode [bannerspace] in your content

There is also an admin panel with some options. Look for Bannerspace Options down the bottom on the left. The gallery should work with the default settings.
